item.title: Analyzing the analysts with tidytext
item.description: The publication of a Capstone Report is the culmination of the Strategic Data Project’s Fellowship. These reports highlight the impact Fellows have on their respective education agencies. There are more than thirty Capstone reports on the SDP website, sorted into four broad categories: Data Capacity, Quality, & Culture Teacher Effectiveness Post-secondary Access & Success School Improvement & Redesign This gives us a general idea of the topics Fellows were covering in their reports, but it would be nice to get a little more detail without having to read more than two dozen reports.
